transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, ha good morning Shardul ji.
Customer: Good morning, ma'am.
Executive: Ji aapne ko buy leads nahi aa rahi correct?
Customer: Yes ma'am, yes ma'am.
Executive: Kya last time kab active the portal mein?
Customer: Abhi abhi just thodi der pehle 5 minute pehle.
Executive: Isse pehle isse pehle?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Isse pehle kab active the kal ya har roz?
Customer: Har roz, har roz, har roz rehta hu.
Executive: Daily basis pe active rehte ho.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Theek hai actually hua kya hai na abhi kisi bhi buyer ne requirement post nahi kari hai. Jo bhi requirement post thi wo consume kar li gayi hai suppliers ke through. To abhi tak koi bhi buy leads jo hai wo just list nahi hai kyuki post nahi kari hai buyers ke through to buyers ka flow bhi thoda sa low hua hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: But within market pe depend karta hai sir baki cheeze but kuch dino mein ye post ho jayegi to aapko automatic mil jayengi.
Customer: Okay. Mujhe ma'am apni pichli baar bhi jo baat hui thi tab bhi yahi problem tha. Lekin usme thik thak to tha lekin usse abhi bahut niche niche ja rahe hai upar ja hi nahi raha hai.
Executive: Pichli baar kab?
Customer: Niche hi ja raha hai graph.
Executive: Pichli baar kab keh rahe hai aap?
Customer: Ab pichli baar aap aapki aur meri baat ho gayi thi aapne wo images maange the book se.
Executive: Ha ha ha aap se baat hui thi tab aapke ha aap maine aapke catalog mein products vgera add kiye the. Uske baad aapne kaha tha thoda bahut improvement hai buy leads aa rahi hai products ke.
Customer: Barabar hai.
Executive: Ha lekin uske baad bhi aur uske pehle bhi jo pichle saal kya usse pichle saal is saal to bahut matlab bahut niche ja raha hai graph.
Executive: Theek hai sir aap ek kaam kar sakte hai. Aap ek abhi desktop mein hai?
Customer: Nahi abhi main close kar diya laptop.
Executive: Achcha kar sakte ho kya open abhi 5 minute ke liye?
Customer: Nahi nahi main abhi jaise bahar hu gaadi mujhe gaadi main side mein ruk ke phir baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Achcha bahar ho.
Customer: Trade.indiamart.com karke ek site hai waha pe aapka jo bhi product hai jisme aap deal karte hai wo products waha pe search kar sakte hai usse related jo bhi buy leads honge na aap use turant consume kar lijiyega sir.
Executive: Barabar hai ma'am lekin wo usse udhar jaane ki jo apna portal hai mera app hai ya jo bhi hai. Itne saal se kar raha tha abhi ye kaunsa ki upar buyer trade pe jao waha se buy leads consume karo kyuki mere buy leads miss ja rahe hai na har week ke. Aur bahut jyada abhi to mere 20 ho gaye shayad abhi bhi. 25 15 ke jyada hi honge 15 ke plus hi honge.
Executive: 17 hai aapke paas balance.
Customer: Ha wahi to. To abhi kal ka ek hi din reh gaya kal ke aur do aa jayenge to 19 ho gaye.
Executive: Theek hai aap ek kaam kar sakte hai maine aapko dekhiye jo bhi jitni bhi IndiaMART pe buy leads jo post hoti hai na sir wo trade.indiamart.com pe hi hoti hai. Market mein jitni bhi aap buy leads dekhoge na waha aap check kar sakte hai. Aapko yaha pe apne portal pe nahi dikh rahe apne app mein nahi dikh raha hai but aapko jo maine bataya hai trade.indiamart.com wo aap.
Customer: Ek baar mujhe whatsapp kar dijiye na.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko ye whatsapp kar dungi. Aap yaha se apne saare products jitne bhi aapke main hai wo search kar sakte hai usse related jitni bhi buy leads post hui hogi na IndiaMART mein wo saari aapko waha mil jayengi recent ki. Theek hai? Waha se aap use consume kar sakte hai. Saath hi mein theek hai? Jitna bhi aapke paas balance bacha hai waha pe aap kar sakte hai aaj ke din mein ho jayega sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Tab tak aap har roz karna padega wo bhi ye har roz karna padega.
Customer: Nahi nahi daily basis ka nahi hai jab tak aapko lag raha hai ki aapke paas buy leads nahi aa rahi tab tak aapko kijiye kyuki abhi hua kya hai na.
Customer: Ye to graph niche ma'am wo upar hi ja nahi raha hai buy leads.
Executive: Ye graph keh rahe ho aap?
Customer: Ha. Wo buy leads abhi kitne itna market down hai. Kaise possible hai ma'am?
Executive: Isliye koi buyer na apni requirement post hi nahi kar raha hai sir. Jo bhi jitni ho rahi hai wo badh ja rahi hai aur wo sold out ho ja rahi hai. Abhi thoda sa flow kam hai main ek baar check karti hu ek second.

Executive: Haan ji buy leads ka abhi flow thoda sa kam hua hai sir. But koi nahi aap tab tak jo maine aapko bataya na trade.indiamart.com ispe aap search kijiyega apne products theek hai yaha se aap buy leads utha sakte hai. Market ke jitne bhi buy leads hote hai sir aapko waha mil jayenge wo recent wali theek hai sir? Aap waha pe select kar sakte hai.
Customer: Kab se nahi mil rahi aapko sir ye buy leads?
Executive: Hello, hello.
Executive: Haan ji main puch rahi thi aapko kab se nahi mil rahi hai sir buy leads?
Customer: Ma'am main bahut baar complaint kiya hai aap aap bhi first baar call kiya tha usme bhi maine bola tha aapko.
Executive: Achcha mujhe jaha tak yaad aa raha hai last time hamari jo baat hui thi wo products se related hui thi then.
Customer: Nahi usse pehle bhi hua tha. Jab aapne aap mera aap mera jo bhi manager bolte hai ya kya bolte ho jo bhi aap aane se pehle se problem hai ye.
Executive: Achcha kab se hi hai phir aapne mujhse beech mein kyu nahi bataya ki aapko buy leads nahi mil rahi maine aapko.
Customer: Ma'am abhi pichli baar aapne kya bola ki product mein wo images daalne ke baad improvement ho jayega ye aapne bol diya iske liye maine aapko images bhej diya.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha.
Customer: Lekin itne saal mujhe abhi mujhe kam se kam 10 saal ho gaye 10 saal mein maine kis catalog mein kuch changes nahi kiye lekin us waqt aa rahe the abhi ek itne saare kam aa rahe.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Matlab maine pehle 10 consume kar raha tha daily ka example lijiye abhi main ek hi kar raha hu. Jo mujhe direct mail pe inquiry aate the wo bhi kam aa rahe pehle paanch chhe aate the abhi ek ek bhi nahi aa raha. Pehle call bahut saare aa jaate the abhi call to ek hi do hi aata hai kal to koi bachche ne lagaya tha phone.
Executive: Achcha kal ka phone.
Customer: Kal aaya tha phone wo.
Executive: Hmm okay okay. Matlab bahut takleef ho rahi hai ma'am.
Executive: Ek aapko inquiry aayi hai 2 November ki dikha rahi hai ye tera rod yellow teacher add karke isme karte hai aap deal?
Customer: Ha ha karte hai na.
Executive: Baat hui sir in buyer se aapki jo Thane se belong karte hai.
Customer: Mere paas.
Executive: Ha mere paas 2022 se jitne bhi buy leads maine consume kiya hai aur jin jin se baat kiya hai uska pura record mere excel mein hai. Matlab uska naam kya hai unka contact number kya hai kaun se state se hai aur unhone kiske regarding inquiry kiya hua hai ye pura mere paas rehta hai.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: 2022 se.
Executive: Aapko 2 November ko aayi thi inse inse kuch baat bani hai aapki?
Customer: Ha ho gayi hai.
Executive: Achcha okay that's great. Theek hai sir hum check karte hai apni side se tab tak aap ye kijiye Monday ko main aapko dobara call karti hu theek hai kuch result agar issue aata hai to Monday ko resolve kar lenge theek hai sir tab tak aap main aapko link send kar deti hu wo theek hai calls ka flow kaisa hai sir kam hai calls ka flow?
Customer: Wahi to bol raha hu ma'am calls ek bhi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Inquiry bhi kam hai correct?
Customer: Ha sab kuch kam hai. Jo direct mail pe inquiry aati thi wo bhi kam hai pehle paanch chhe aate the abhi bhi to kuch bolne ki zarurat hi nahi ek bhi aata hai to aise lagta hai are yaar aa gaya.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Aise lagta hai abhi.
Executive: Theek hai ek D rank mein yaha pe aapka product hai baki sabko A rank mein main isko kar dungi sahi taki aapke catalog mein almost sab kuch cheeze to maine sahi kar di hai theek hai main dobara check kar leti hu tab tak aap is link pe main send karungi usme kaam kijiye theek hai product search kar lijiyega. Monday ko main aapko dobara connect karke feedback ke liye theek hai sir kuch issue aayega to Monday ko dobara sab kuch baith ke resolve kar lenge proper okay Monday ko kab tak connect karu aapse?
Customer: 9:30 ko subah.
Executive: Morning 9:30.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Theek hai ma'am sir dekhiye aapko kuch bhi issue aata hai Shardul ji aap mujhe mere number pe call kar lijiyega theek hai aapne abhi ye IndiaMART wale customer ke hawale se kiya tha to mujhe hi aaya tha to aap simple aap mera whatsapp number aapke paas hai normal mere usme call kar lijiyega theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay Shardul ji thank you have a nice day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buy leads.

- Graph is going down.

- Calls and direct mail inquiries have decreased.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested using trade.indiamart.com for buy leads.

- Executive will WhatsApp the link to the customer.

- Executive will check the customer's catalog.

- Executive will call back on Monday for feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back on Monday at 9:30 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trade.indiamart.com, catalog, follow up
